alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 8:31AM MDT until August 01 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will be on the increase this afternoon and through the evening. The higher amounts of monsoonal moisture isn`t expected to move north of the Nevada border until late this evening. Therefore limited wetting rains are expected this afternoon and early evening... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 PM MDT this evening. * THUNDERSTORMS...Becoming scattered by mid afternoon. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts of 40 to 50 mph are expected in the vicinity of any thunderstorms.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
